We may enable trusted third parties (such as ad servers) to collect Anonymous Information, by deploying certain tracking technologies within Start, including, but not limited to, for these purposes.

These third parties (such as advertisers, marketing affiliates, ad agencies and ad servers) use cookies, clear gifs or similar technologies to help present such advertisements, and to help track, measure and research the advertisements' performance and effectiveness, as well as for other purposes, such as analytics and statistics.
We may use Google Analytics cookies to collect information about visitor behavior on Start.
Finally, these cookies are used to select and analyze the advertisements that are shown to you and their relevancy.
Some advertisements can be segmented by information available about you (such as geographical location, age group or interests), while respecting your ad configuration.
These cookies register how many times you visited Start, if the visit was a direct access, a search or a referral from other site or app, and the keywords used in the searches.
We may use AdMob, AdSense and DoubleClick cookies for advertising purposes.
You can turn off certain third party cookies for advertising purposes by visiting the Network Advertising Initiative.
